message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its features and value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to consider purchasing the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $12,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and counter-offer.  While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $17,000.  I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.

I appreciate your flexibility, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, but I can only go up to $13,500. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
